SEARCH

Package io.clonecloudstore.common.quarkus.stream

package io.clonecloudstore.common.quarkus.stream
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoundedByteBuffer
    Buffer with buffering allowing One Writer and Multiple Readers.
    ChunkInputStream
    Transform one InputStream to Multiple InputStream, each one being a chunk of the primary one.
    ProducerConsumerLock
    Producer-Consumer lock implementation : (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Producer%E2%80%93consumer_problem) Inspired from https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/concurrent/locks/Condition.html implementation Implements Closeable - When closed, all locks are unlocked.
    TeeInputStream
    Generate multiples InputStreams from one to many using Pipe
